Text.Page: After Gutrend kulkaris raided the Valley of Titans south of Lumbertown, Prefect Daven sent you to help contain the problem and restore the peace.

Urgent Mission Orders

Gutrends have pushed deep into the Valley of Titans.



Report to Prefect Daven in Lumbertown for your assignment.

You're here about the Gutrend business, right? We've set up a defensive post at Two Oaks Ranch, but I don't know how long it'll hold.

Go through the southern gate, head to the ranch, and find {@LinkCreature:206#1010#Petrina}. She'll know how to use you.

You here to help? Good. The Gutrends seem dumb, but don't be fooled. Underestimate them and they'll cut you down.

But for all their cleverness, they still tend to rely on their leader, {@LinkCreature:6#7051#Smulch}. If we can take that one down, the rest should be easier to target.

Be careful out there. He's known for crushing enemies' skulls with a single blow.

Really? You took care of him? He's finished? I've sent my best soldiers out there only to have them slaughtered! But you head out there and kill him like it's nothing!

Not, uh, that I was sending you on a suicide mission or anything. I mean, I had faith in you. Daven spoke very highly of you.

In light of your success, what would you say to another favor?"A favor such as?"

Well, we're getting things under control here, but Echo Ranch has been asking for help.

While we get back on our feet, I need you to head over to the ranch and see if you can help.
Reinforcements never looked so good. Head east to what's left of Colchester and meet up with {@LinkCreature:206#1003#Sozia}. She's got her hands full over there.

If you're not here to help, the road's that way. We've got no room for loafers. Not anymore.

If you're my reinforcements, I need you to find any survivors in town. Bring them to me. And do it quickly.

You've helped so many people! Please, take this.

We couldn't have saved them without you.
